---
category: news
title: "ExecuteQueries REST API versus XMLA endpoints at scale"
excerpt: "Power BI APIs can support you at any scale, but there is no one-size-fits-all API. The ExecuteQueries API is a great choice at small scale. For large-scale solutions, switch to XMLA endpoints and host your datasets on Power BI Premium."
